verses.roman:
eta bali' prabhure lañā tathāya vasila
prabhure prakāśānanda puchite lāgila

synonyms: eta bali'—saying this; prabhure—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; lañā—taking; tathāya vasila—sat down there; prabhure—unto Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; prakāśānanda—Prakāśānanda Sarasvatī; puchite lāgila—began to inquire.
translation: After saying this, Prakāśānanda Sarasvatī sat down with Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu and began to question the Lord as follows.
